actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the rapid amortization of noise pollution control facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the amortization over a 60 month period of noise pollution control facilities where such facilities relate to the abatement or control of work place environment noise or product noise levels (excluding transportational product items).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the rapid amortization of noise pollution control facilities.
